tasks.label: Agent: Paste-ready (systeme-mode)
args:
PY=\"${workspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/python\"; if [ ! -x "$PY" ]; then PY=python3; fi; 
$PY scripts/agent_codex.py --prompt prompts/rewrite_to_house_style.txt --input website_code_block_ORGANIZED/headers --output docs/ai_outputs/_snippets --include-ext '.html,.css,.js' --provider openai --model gpt-4o-mini --systeme-mode --verbose
